title: Need opinions on a new laptop
body:
Hey guys im after a laptop to take with me when im on nightshift at work ( and yes im allowed to play games of a night ) im looking to spend 400 max as i already have a good desktop at home, and i don't do nightshift every night so i don't need it to be a beast laptop. Lowest graphics doesn't bother me but i don't want lowest graphics and still lag, if you get me? Anyways 400 dollars max im looking to spend im located in nsw if that changes anything? 

Cheers guys.

replies.body: I could recommend you a [$650](http://www.graysonline.com/retail/pspj6a-00g001-r/computers-and-it-equipment/toshiba-satellite-p840-00g-14-hd-c-i7-3517u-8gb-1tb-nvidia-gt-630m?utm_source=google&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=PLAComputers%20%26%20IT%20Equipment&cid=ps%257ccmp%3aPLA%257cadg%3aComputers%20%26%20IT%20Equipment%257ckey%3aGOLB_PSPJ6A-00G001-R&CAWELAID=120130350000224913&CAGPSPN=pla&catargetid=120130350000172769&cadevice=c) which runs a lot of high end games, has high storage and runs at a pretty reasonable speed, I use it (because the parts for my desktop still haven't arrived) to do gaming, it runs league at 160fps uncapped which is reasonable for a laptop which wasn't made for gaming to begin with. And it runs game such as dying light (high demand games) pretty smoothly. Unless you want to be playing nothing but flash games i don't think a $400 will cut it for most games.
the lappy only needs to play league, no other games aha. But in saying that what is the one for $650 i dont mind paying that much

ill try get you a link to one that wasn't sold out just a few hours ago.

real shame though, its specs were same as this (except the possessors and i core were better) meaning it would run better than my laptop.

[Here we go](http://www.ebay.com.au/itm/like/131725238026?limghlpsr=true&hlpht=true&ul_noapp=true&hlpv=2&chn=ps&lpid=107&ops=true&viphx=1) its cheaper ([$580](http://www.ebay.com.au/itm/like/131725238026?limghlpsr=true&hlpht=true&ul_noapp=true&hlpv=2&chn=ps&lpid=107&ops=true&viphx=1)) only difference is its i5 instead of i7 Its quad core is still 1.9GHz-3.0GHz

Do note 3 people have it on their watch list, and it goes off store in 4 days, so if you want to buy it, i recommend doing so very soon

It is quite cheap, and very good pricing for a laptop that can run plenty of higher end games too, this laptop will definitely be able to run league smoothly. Even got itself a Nvidia graphics card (which it doesn't even need to run league, but just improves the overall quality of the game if chosen to be used)

If you ask me, this is going to be one of the best deals you may see in a while for a cheap laptop that can run league (among other things) to a great standard.

Though you can get better if you invest to around $700-$1000

http://www.gumtree.com.au/s-ad/tuncurry/laptops/acer-aspire-v3-571g/1099230675

this is 300 on gumtree is it any good?
heaps good for the price. If it works for 12-18 months your laughing.
HA, you can build a PC with that money.
What would people recommend around the 600 mark then?

400 only gets you garbage unless you get lucky and find a nice deal somewhere.

For a LoL playing Laptop you need to spend 600-700.

You can always try Gumtree or a Pawn Shop and get a 2nd hand one for cheap.

Mmm 400 might be a _bit_ low for a laptop to run games, but if you're looking for something real budget, try finding the cheapest ultrabook you can with an nvidia graphics card. That was my experience when I was looking fora  cheap laptop that could run games, but I haven't looked for 4~ years so I don't know exactly what's around.
